post.text: Hillary on the faith that drives her: "Do all the good you can for all the people you can in all the ways you can."

comment.author: Stefan
comment.text: I just can't listen to this. How can she say she's a Christian and support abortions? And do some of the things she does?

replies.author: Michael
replies.text: You're Ok with a serial adulterer and potential rapist? Whose church didn't even know he was a member? Mmmm. And you know planned parenthood provides mammograms and birth control to women who wouldn't be able to get them otherwise? Judgmental much? You can't get too self righteous about Hilary and support Adolf Drumpf....just saying...

replies.author: Stefan
replies.text: Never said I supported Trump! I asked about Hillary. And women's health services can be provided in other avenues and ARE! Go put away your pitchfork and quit looking for ways to twist my comment. Would you like a list of horrible things she's done? Since you think I don't know about Donald. Not judgmental...factual! Not self righteous...honest! Something you can't say about Hillary.
